articles.title: Nanny review: Blumhouse’s immigrant story has a horror problem - Polygon
articles.description: Anna Diop and Michelle Monaghan star in Nanny, a compelling immigrant story full of horror-movie visions and racial tension in the spirit of Get Out and His House. Debuts in theaters Nov. 23; streaming on Amazon Video Dec. 16.

articles.title: Movie Review: Jonathan Majors and Glen Powell in Devotion - Vulture
articles.description: Movie Review: Starring Jonathan Majors and Glen Powell, J.D. Dillard’s historical war drama Devotion tells the true story of the friendship between Korean War fliers Jesse Brown and Tom Hudner.
